titleInfo.title: The Comprehensive MAC Taxonomy Database: comatose

mods.abstract: The comprehensive MAC taxonomy databaseÂ (comatose) is a collection of 327 wireless media/medium access protocols published between 1970 and 2017. The latest version is available [online](https://6xq.net/comatose/).
